'''The Distance Between It and the Flames''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for The Distance Between It and the Flames is obtainable from [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|30|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Iron Chunk = 4
|White Iron Chunk = 4
